Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.net

Interface BlockNodePacketEncoder<N extends BlockNode>

Type Parameters:
N - the exact type of BlockNode this is designed to encode.
public interface BlockNodePacketEncoder<N extends BlockNode>
Used for encoding a BlockNode to a PacketByteBuf for sending to the client for debug rendering.
